description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Run around the triangular 3D castle avoiding the grim reapers and collect the treasures. As you advanced through the stages more and more grim reapers appear. If the BLOOD MOON appears in the top right corner for a few seconds, it’s your turn to chase the grim reapers and win back some lost lives. Try to improve your high score.  Action arcade at its best.
